Describe: Can be used on the <color=#f5b60b>Main Target</color> to replace its action in the next turn with <color=#f5b60b>stay</color> (a battle will be triggered if the target stays on a defense facility).
Name: Stay

Describe: Can be used on the <color=#f5b60b>Main Target</color> to replace its action in the next turn with <color=#f5b60b>stay</color> (a battle will be triggered if the target stays on a defense facility).
Name: Stay

Describe: Can be used on the <color=#f5b60b>Main Target</color> to replace its action in the next turn with <color=#f5b60b>turn</color> (a battle will not be triggered if the target takes a turn on a defense facility).
Name: Turn

Describe: Can be used on the <color=#f5b60b>Main Target</color> to replace its action in the next turn with <color=#f5b60b>turn</color> (a battle will not be triggered if the target takes a turn on a defense facility).
Name: Turn

Describe: Can be used on a <color=#f5b60b>block</color>. If the main target stays on this block at the end of turn, it will lose <color=#f5b60b>200 HP</color> (traps will disappear after they are triggered once).
Name: Bleeding Trap

Describe: Can be used on a <color=#f5b60b>block</color>. If the main target stays on this block at the end of turn, it will lose <color=#f5b60b>5% HP</color> (traps will disappear after they are triggered once).
Name: Bleeding Trap

Describe: Can be used on the <color=#f5b60b>Main Target</color> to make it immediately lose <color=#f5b60b>200 HP</color>.
Name: True Damage

Describe: Can be used on the <color=#f5b60b>Main Target</color> to make it immediately lose <color=#f5b60b>5% HP</color>.
Name: True Damage

Describe: Can be used on the <color=#f5b60b>deployed force</color> to grant an effect: <color=#f5b60b>Every time this force lands a 50-hit combo in battle, creates an explosion that deals 8000% of ATK as True Damage</color> (permanent).
Name: Combo Boost

Describe: Can be used on the <color=#f5b60b>deployed force</color> to grant an effect: <color=#f5b60b>Every time this force is switched out of battle, casts a shockwave that deals True DMG equal to 4000% of ATK and reduces the enemy's Extra DMG Reduction by 100% for 8s</color> (permanent).
Name: Switch Boost

Describe: Can be used on the <color=#f5b60b>deployed force</color> to grant an effect: <color=#f5b60b>Every time this force casts an ultimate skill in battle, inflicts the enemy with Corrosion for 15s, reducing all Resistance by 10% and dealing 1000% of ATK as True Damage every second, stacking up to 2 times</color> (permanent).
Name: Ultimate Boost

Describe: Can be used on the <color=#f5b60b>deployed force</color> to grant an effect: <color=#f5b60b>Every time this force makes a 3-Ping in battle, summons a bonus light spear that deals 5000% of ATK as True Damage</color> (permanent).
Name: Signal Amplifier
